Description:
Our client is into Entertainment industry. They are now looking for Officer – Health, Safety & Environment.      Roles & Responsibilities: Conducts, assist and / or facilitate regular assessment and hazard identification activities at different areas of the Park, including but not limited to rides and other attractions, food and beverage outlets, retail outlets, entertainment venues, common areas, office and BOH areas, infrastructure, and other support facilities.
Identify and propose effective measures to control the hazards and associated risks based on findings of risks assessment activities.
Formulate and implement regular monitoring system to check implementation of the measures in place at different areas through regular checks and inspections.
Conduct independent investigation and submit official reports to Sr. Supervisor or QHSE Manager and / or QHSE Department Head for occurring incidences which will include identification of root causes, corrective action plans and suggestion to prevent recurrences and other requirement of the incident reports process.
Evaluate other reports pertaining to any HSE related incident in the Park.Skills
Skills:
Graduate of an Engineering Degree
Possessing Degree or NEBOSH Certificate or Diploma related to HSE
Adept with local and Federal Laws and applicable international laws related to HSE

Minimum three (3) years’ experience in a similar role
Worked in similar position with wide exposure in theme parks, attractions, hotels, and resorts, or in any leisure and entertainment industry
Experience in integrated management system (ISO 9001, OHSAS 18001 / ISO 45001, ISO 14001)
Capable in writing policies, procedures, plans, manuals, and other similar documents
Highly skilled in various computer applications
Proven business writing, reporting and presentation skills
High level of policy and procedure writing
Strong administrative skills
